name: toni cuffed cardi
notes:
are you ready to get super cozy?! as soon as you put on the toni cuffed cardi, you won’t want to take it off. this super casual cardigan features a sloped neckline, functional buttons, and extra long sleeves that you can cuff to your preferred length. the result? a classic cardigan to get you through any social event this fall. includes tutorial video

size guide: the pattern includes the sizes listed below. note: choose the size most suited to the fit you want. the finished cardigan is designed with 4″ of positive ease (meaning it is designed to be just slightly oversized with fitted sleeves).

s. finished bust 38″. sized for bust 34″. 1025 yards; 5 skeins.
m. finished bust 42″. sized for bust 38″. 1195 yards; 5 skeins.
l. finished bust 46″. sized for bust 42″. 1310 yards; 6 skeins.
xl. finished bust 50″. sized for bust 46″. 1480 yards; 6 skeins.
2xl. finished bust 54″. sized for bust 50″. 1660 yards; 7 skeins.
3xl. finished bust 58″. sized for bust 54″. 1785 yards; 8 skeins.
